comments:
Using WTP 2.0.1 from Sept 7 2007

1. create new XML Examples project
2. open GolfCountryClub.xsd
3. select GolfClub Element
4. In properties view, go to extensions tab
5. Click on Add button
6. In dialog box, hit Add button
7. Start typing a name
8. Get the below exception every time you type a character.

I think this is because I start typing a name before the schema field is populated.  If i populate the schema field first, everything is fine.
